Posts.Content: hi  i was given the desicision to chemo or not and i choose not to . was probably one of the hardest descisions i had to make but i felt the benefits where not great enough  think about it long and hard and dont let anyone sway your decision as it must be entirely your choice but its your body and you must decide was is the best for you !  im north of you in inverness  all the best  kim x

Posts.Content: thanks alaval its great to hear from you . i cant have the test because my local  scottish health authority has got it in place yet ! surgeon says im all clear so my head is telling me i shouldnt put myself through chemo , i assume its to stop it reoccuring but i feel i would rather take my chance i have endometrial cancer already  and im still here. im lucky i have good hubby now even though im looking after my 10 year old stepson today and i feel like strangling him  kim x
Posts.Title: anybody decide not to have chemo?

Posts.Content: hello ladies  hope every is doing ok today , had lumpectomy and biopsy 3 weeks ago and all clear except that it was a grade 3 instead of grade 2 , surgeon was very positive but said i would have to consider chemo as part of my treatment , that totally floored me as i had been told all along that it would be radiotherapy and tamoixifen . said it was my choice and i just wondering if anybody had been in the same situation and decided not to have chemo ? incredibly weepy dont know if its me being a wimp or just the result of the last few weeks  wishing everyone the best kim x
Posts.Title: anybody decide not to have chemo?

Posts.Content: Hi fadima I to was diagnosed last year and finished treatment early this year there have been many times I've been angry and lots of times sad . I just had my first year check up and was a wreck waiting for the results I'm fine .I know that I'm a different person wiser , stronger for this experience . Medication doesn't help that can be a problem for me some days as that drags me down I just have to pull myself up . The anger will subside as you start to relax and enjoy life again
